item.redstone_wire.chain_connector.max_c: This chain already has maximum connections (3)
redstone_wire.configuration.title: Redstone Wire Configs
redstone_wire.configuration.redstoneChai: Settings for redstone chain connections and network behavior
redstone_wire.configuration.cableRenderi: Visual settings for cable appearance and rendering
Color customization for powered and unpowered cables
redstone_wire.configuration.maxConnectio: Maximum distance (in blocks) between two connected chain blocks. Connections beyond this distance are rejected.
Maximum number of connections allowed per chain block. Prevents visual clutter and performance issues.
redstone_wire.configuration.updateInterv: How often to perform periodic network updates (in ticks). 20 ticks = 1 second. This acts as a backup to event-driven updates.
redstone_wire.configuration.signalLossDe: How many ticks to wait before clearing cached signal after input is lost. Prevents flickering when power briefly turns off.
redstone_wire.configuration.cableSegment: Number of segments to divide cable into (more = smoother curve).
redstone_wire.configuration.cableThickne: Thickness of cable in blocks (0.03 = ~2 pixels).
redstone_wire.configuration.cableSagAmou: Amount of sag at the middle of the cable (0.0 = no sag, -1.0 = full sag).
redstone_wire.configuration.maxRenderDis: Maximum distance to render cables (in blocks).
redstone_wire.configuration.unpoweredRed: Red component for unpowered cables (0.0 = no red, 1.0 = full red).
redstone_wire.configuration.poweredRedBa: Base red component for powered cables (0.0 = no red, 1.0 = full red).
redstone_wire.configuration.poweredRedBo: Additional red component for powered cables based on power level (0.0 = no extra red, 1.0 = full extra red).
redstone_wire.configuration.greenValue.t: Green component for cables (0.0 = no green, 1.0 = full green).
redstone_wire.configuration.blueValue.to: Blue component for cables (0.0 = no blue, 1.0 = full blue).
redstone_wire.configuration.unpoweredRed: Red component for unpowered cables (alternate segments) (0.0 = no red, 1.0 = full red).
redstone_wire.configuration.poweredRedBa: Base red component for powered cables (alternate segments) (0.0 = no red, 1.0 = full red).
redstone_wire.configuration.poweredRedBo: Additional red component for powered cables (alternate segments) based on power level (0.0 = no extra red, 1.0 = full extra red).
redstone_wire.configuration.greenValueAl: Green component for cables (alternate segments) (0.0 = no green, 1.0 = full green).
redstone_wire.configuration.blueValueAlt: Blue component for cables (alternate segments) (0.0 = no blue, 1.0 = full blue).
redstone_wire.configuration.logDirtBlock: Whether to log the dirt block on common setup.
A magic number for testing purposes.
redstone_wire.configuration.magicNumberI: What you want the introduction message to be for the magic number.
redstone_wire.configuration.items.toolti: A list of items to log on common setup.
